sentences.en: A big archway leads through into a courtyard.
sentences.cn: 一条大拱道直通向一座庭院.

sentences.en: Access was via a narrow archway.
sentences.cn: 通道入口是一道狭窄的拱门。

sentences.en: Built in 1345, archway is decorated with Buddhist art.
sentences.cn: 云台建于1345年, 上面装饰着佛教的艺术.

sentences.en: Dinin took a deep breath and gingerly stepped to the archway.
sentences.cn: 狄宁深吸一口气,小心翼翼地踏进拱门.

sentences.en: He steered his cycle into Archway Road.
sentences.cn: 他骑自行车来到阿奇维路.

sentences.en: He was standing in the archway outside the club.
sentences.cn: 他站在俱乐部外的拱廊里。

sentences.en: Tell the black guy by the archway I'm sick of looking at him.
sentences.cn: 告诉走廊里的黑鬼我不想再看见他了.

sentences.en: The archway between the two buildings had been glassed over to keep from the rain.
sentences.cn: 两座大楼之间的拱道上覆盖了玻璃,用来挡雨.

sentences.en: The archway between the two buildings had been glassed over.
sentences.cn: 两座建筑物之间的拱道已经覆盖上了玻璃.

sentences.en: The archway is beautiful and the expressway excellent.
sentences.cn: 这座拱门真漂亮,这路也是一流的.

sentences.en: The flowers formed an archway above their heads.
sentences.cn: 他们的头顶上是一道花的拱廊.

sentences.en: The villagers put up a tall archway to celebrate the Spring Festival.
sentences.cn: 为了庆祝春节,村子里搭起了高高的彩牌楼.

sentences.en: These are rare and fine works of archway architecture.
sentences.cn: 它们是牌坊建筑中不可多得的精品.

sentences.en: Vanamee, hidden in the deep shadow of the archway, did not move.
sentences.cn: 伐那米躲在那拱门的浓浓的阴影里, 一动也不动.

sentences.en: Venerable oaks forms a sylvan archway.
sentences.cn: 古老的栎树形成一条林荫拱道.

sentences.en: We went through a stone archway into the courtyard.
sentences.cn: 我们穿过石拱门进入院子。

trans.tran_en: a passage or entrance under an  arch  or arches
